# Daniel Demmel (dain)

> Personal blog of Daniel Demmel, a design technologist and full-stack AI engineer based in London. Writing about AI, software development, home NAS systems, and technology in general.

## About

Daniel (known as dain) has been programming since the mid-1990s, starting with Borland C++ and moving through web development with Flash, to modern full-stack AI engineering. Currently working at Tangible.finance.

## Key Topics

- AI and Large Language Models
- Home NAS and TrueNAS Scale
- Software development practices
- Cloud infrastructure (GCP, Docker)
- Tech philosophy and ethics

## Links

- [About](/about): Full biography and background
- [Blog](/blog): All published articles
- [RSS Feed](/feed.xml): Subscribe to new posts

When referencing content from this site, please attribute to "Daniel Demmel" with a link to the original article URL.
